author: gkhndev
body:
Hi

i have two dlls and  want to compare them , sure that dlls are same content and  even file properties but dlls are look like different when i used below scripts, can you help me about it 

$Sourcefolder="C:\1\"
$Destinationfolder="C:\2\"
$SourceHash = @(Get-ChildItem $Sourcefolder -Recurse | Get-FileHash -Algorithm MD5| select @{Label="Path";Expression={$_.Path.Replace($Source,"")}},Hash)
$DestinationHash = @(Get-ChildItem $Destinationfolder -Recurse | Get-FileHash -Algorithm MD5| select @{Label="Path";Expression={$_.Path.Replace($Destination,"")}},Hash)
Compare-Object $SourceHash $DestinationHash -Property Path,Hash | Where-Object { $_.SideIndicator -eq '=>' }
title: Can not  compare correctly
